info.description: A production-ready Go backend for a social media mobile application with posts, business profiles, marketplace, real-time chat, and location services.
info.title: Hamsaya Backend API

post.description: Authenticate admin user with email and password. Only allows users with admin role to login.

parameters.description: Admin login credentials (email and password only)
parameters.name: request

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of businesses with optional filtering by status and search term

parameters.description: Search term (name, license_no, email, phone_number, province, district)
parameters.name: search

put.description: Update business information including name, license, contact info, and location (admin operation)

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of posts with optional filtering by type and search term

parameters.description: Filter by post type (FEED, EVENT, SELL, PULL, or 'all')
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Search term (title, description, user email, business name)
parameters.name: search

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive statistics for SELL type posts including total, sold, active, expired, revenue, and average price

put.description: Update post information including title, description, visibility, and type (admin operation)

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of reports with optional filtering by type, status, and search term

parameters.description: Filter by report type (POST, COMMENT, USER, BUSINESS, or 'all')
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Filter by status (PENDING, REVIEWING, RESOLVED, REJECTED, or 'all')
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Search term (reporter email/name, reported item, reason)
parameters.name: search

get.description: Get a paginated list of all business reports
Get details of a specific business report by ID
get.summary: Get a specific business report (Admin only)

put.description: Update the status of a business report

get.description: Get a paginated list of all comment reports
Get details of a specific comment report by ID
get.summary: Get a specific comment report (Admin only)

put.description: Update the status of a comment report

get.description: Get a paginated list of all post reports

put.description: Update the status of a post report

get.description: Get a paginated list of all user reports
Get details of a specific user report by ID
get.summary: Get a specific user report (Admin only)

put.description: Update the resolved status of a user report
Update the status of a report (PENDING, REVIEWING, RESOLVED, REJECTED)

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive statistics for the admin dashboard including user counts, post counts by type, business counts, and pending reports
Retrieve a paginated list of users with optional filtering by active status and search term

parameters.description: Search term (email, first name, last name)
parameters.name: search

put.description: Update user information including email, role, names, and verification status (admin operation)
Activate or deactivate a user account

post.description: Change password for authenticated user
Request password reset

Authenticate user with email and password. If user doesn't exist, automatically creates a new account with incomplete profile (is_complete: false). If user exists, performs normal login with password verification and MFA checks.
Logout from current session
Logout from all active sessions
Verify MFA code during login
Authenticate or register a user using Apple OAuth
Authenticate or register a user using Facebook OAuth
Authenticate or register a user using Google OAuth
Get a new access token using refresh token

Creates complete user profile with firstname, lastname, and location. If user exists with incomplete profile, it will be updated and marked as complete. Requires email, password, first_name, last_name, latitude, and longitude.
Reset password with reset token

get.description: Get all active sessions for the authenticated user

post.description: Login if user exists, otherwise register new user with location
Verify user's email address

get.description: Get all businesses owned by the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new business profile

get.description: Get all active business categories
List business profiles with filters

parameters.description: Radius in kilometers for nearby search

Get database connection pool statistics
Check if the application is alive
Get application runtime and system metrics
Check if the application is ready to serve traffic
Get Redis server information and statistics

Disable multi-factor authentication for the user
